author: trawick
msg: Change some apr_ssize_t uses to apr_size_t.

author: trawick
msg: Tweak the logic to avoid "make distclean" inside APR directories so that
it works on Tru64.  On that platform, when grep failed (because we weren't
in an APR directory), the non-zero exit status failed the entire operation.

author: gstein
msg: *) sprinkle a little magic "const" dust around (specifically, to compensate
for the prototype change to ap_os_create_privileged_process())
